summary: SummaryMaybelline Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner creates a fully defined lip look that helps lipstick stay put for your most impactful lip.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefine your lips with Maybelline's mechanical, self-sharpening linerCreamy, no-smudge lip liner formula prevents lipstick bleeding and featheringComes in a collection of color-coordinating hues from nudes to plumsAlso available in Clear, used as a lip primer to make lipstick last longerItem 2502958How To UseStep 1. Define a Cupid's Bow: Draw an X at the top center of lips.Step 2. Outline Outer Lips: Slightly over draw at your natural lip line.Step 3. Contour Inside Lips: Softly use liner in your lip corners and center of lip curves.Step 4. Fill: Start from the center of your lips and fill in with Color Sensational Lip Color.IngredientsDimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Dicalcium Phosphate, Disiloxane, Alumina, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bht, Caprylyl Trimethicone, Citric Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lecithin, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol. May Contain: CI 15850/Red 6, CI 15850/Red 7 Lake, CI 17200/Red 33 Lake, CI 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090/Blue 1 Lake, CI 45410/Red 28 Lake, CI 77120/Barium Sulfate, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499/Iron Oxides, CI 77742/Manganese Violet, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Mica.
how_to_use: Step 1. Define a Cupid's Bow: Draw an X at the top center of lips.Step 2. Outline Outer Lips: Slightly over draw at your natural lip line.Step 3. Contour Inside Lips: Softly use liner in your lip corners and center of lip curves.Step 4. Fill: Start from the center of your lips and fill in with Color Sensational Lip Color.

reviews.headline: Gone griege is a staple
reviews.comments: My favorite lip liner!  Goes with any lip combo.  Reminds me of stone its just a tad darker and a different shade.  Its cool toned and it last longer than mac lip liners.  I buy backups when they go on sale because they always out of stock.

reviews.headline: Been hunting for this color PERFECT FOR FAIR COOL TONED SKIN
reviews.comments:
Oh my gosh ive searched high and low for a color that looks like this on my cool fair toned skin and this is it !!!
Will see if it last as long as mac but for the price its perfect.  the exact color ive searched for and ive tried SO MANY.

reviews.headline: AMAZINGGGG
reviews.comments: Great color wearing rich chocolate forever such a great lip liner üòç

reviews.headline: Iconic
reviews.comments: I can definitely see what the hype is about with the shade gone greige! It's beautiful, and gives the 90s vibe. Decent staying power throughout the day but will come off when eating.

reviews.headline: My new favorite lipliner
reviews.comments: Stumbled across this lipliner and so glad I did! I got number 125 Magnetic mauve and it pairs great with l'oreal worth it lipstick and lip oil. It's my new favorite lip combo! Will definitely purchase this again! Very creamy and smooth. I wear this practically every day!

reviews.headline: Great cool toned lip liner!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a cool toned lip liner and this Maybelline Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner in Gone Greige is perfect. Worn alone or with lipstick, I love it!

reviews.headline: One of my fav lip liners
reviews.comments:
I use these lip liners daily. Im fair skinned and Gone Greige is my favorite with or without a fake tan.
I use it with lipsticks and lip gloss and when it does fade, it fades evenly.

reviews.headline: Excellent lip liner
reviews.comments: I got this on recommendation from Marlena Stell on YT. Turns out the formula is excellent - creamy but blendable, very long lasting, too! Sadly, I'm quite fair and the Gone Greige shade is a bit too dark for me. I'll def buy again but in a lighter shade. Simply excellent formula!!

reviews.headline: Color doesn't match pictured item
reviews.comments: It was an online purchase. The item pictured wasn't the same or close to the item i received.  The item received is closer to a black/purple rather than a fuscia. As for the formula, its very good. Would recommend buying liners in person though so one can see the true color.

reviews.headline: The best lipliner
reviews.comments: This lip liner glides on so smoothly, it's better than many high end products that I've tried. It lasts all day long. I love it and i'll def be buying more colors.

reviews.headline: THE BEST LIP LINER
reviews.comments: I am a MAC lipliner junkie but I made this purchase on the go and when I tell you it goes on like butter but stays like a sharpie, im not lying. I wear this for a 12 hour shift and eat 4 times during tha time and it stays put. Totally toffee is my go to. Will repurchase.

reviews.headline: If you're not medium/fair skinned don't even bother
reviews.comments: Their rich chocolate shade is nowhere near as dark brown as in in the image, it looks red irl. Another brand that doesn't make shades for dark skin *pretends to be shocked* such a waste of money. and i bought 2 :/ maybelline needs to do better.

reviews.headline: gone greige is the best cool toned brown
reviews.comments: love the mauvey undertone of gone greige. other cool browns gives me the mustache look and this looks so natural and is the right undertone and depth. you wont go wrong it's so beautiful. not too brown not too grey not too orange and not too light or dark. I will 100 percent buy again in bulk

reviews.headline: Gonna Go Fast
reviews.comments: creamy & and you wouldnt think itd be a good shade but it surprisingly is for my cool tone skin

reviews.headline: Broken Upon Opening
reviews.comments: The tip of the clear lipliner was leaning at a 30 degree angle upon opening the packaging. I touched it lighly and realized it was broken. Will return.

reviews.headline: Yay!
reviews.comments: Love! Shade 135

reviews.headline: Lasts longer than your lipstick
reviews.comments: Best lip liner ive ever used and it doesnt require a sharpneer. It stays on all day.

reviews.headline: NO I would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I was very disappointed.  The color said Brick but when I put it on the color was not brick.

reviews.headline: Smears, dry & not long lasting
reviews.comments: I typically buy Kylie lip kits for the lip liner to use as a lipstick but they are def over priced so I wanted to try this liner because the ink crayons by Maybelline are amazing. Sadly this smeared everywhere and also did not last after a few sips from a can of water, complete opposite from the ink crayons. Would not recommend

reviews.headline: Smooth liner and no sharpening needed.
reviews.comments: The perfect lip liner. Smooth and silk and stays put. I also use this as a lipstick and since it is a mat finish, I top it off with a gloss.

media.headline: The Natural look for the olive skin
love them and they smell goood
Divine Wine is a Divine Shade
media.caption: Lipcolor in shade "Divine Wine"

faceoff_positive.comments: Okay, this color is amazing! I think it is absolutely perfect for fall since it is so dark. It has a beautiful metallic shine to it which gives your lips some depth. I had never used it before and was pleasantly surprised to see how long it lasted. I put it on around 3 and drank a whole bottle of water and a can of Dr Pepper, I ate, and the color was still on and hadn't smudged off at all. So it is definitely long wear which is awesome. I also liked the fact that it is a buildable color. One layer gives you a fairly natural look which is nice for everyday, if you add on a couple of more layers you get a dark sultry lip. Definitely wanna try this in other colors as well.
faceoff_positive.headline: Okay, this color is...

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought pitch black but when I put it on the lipstick wouldn't stick that well and wound up being fairly light as I couldn't get enough on to be even and fully black. It also came off immediately when I put my lips together.
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointed
